quoteText:
Bitwarden uses cookies to make interactions with our service easy and meaningful.
We use cookies (and similar technologies, like HTML5 localStorage) to keep you logged in, remember your preferences, and provide information for future development of Bitwarden.
title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

tosdr.tldr: From the Privacy Policy, "Bitwarden uses cookies to make interactions with our service easy and meaningful. We use cookies (and similar technologies, like HTML5 localStorage) to keep you logged in, remember your preferences, and provide information for future development of Bitwarden. We also use cookies to identify a device, for security reasons." They also state that "if you disable your browser or device's ability to accept cookies, you may not be able to log in or properly use Bitwarden's services."
